com.codecool.shop.dao

Interface ProductCategoryDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductCategoryDaoJDBC, ProductCategoryDaoMem

    public interface ProductCategoryDao

    This interface is used for establishing the methods, that the implementation classes have to implement

    This interface is extended by both ProductCategoryDaoMem and ProductCategoryDaoJDBC, they are doing the same thing, providing data to the application, Mem uses the memory, JDBC uses a database for storing data.
    Since:
    2017-05-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Majoross Daniel, Racz Anna, Adam Kovacs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(ProductCategory category)
      This method is used to add a product category object to the database/Memory
      ProductCategory find(int id)
      This method is used to find a specific ProductCategory in the database.
      java.util.List<ProductCategory> getAll()
      This method is for getting all ProductCategory objects that are stored in the database.
      void remove(int id)
      This method is used to remove a specific ProductCategory from the database.
